meanings.definition: A substance that is recognized by the immune system as foreign and triggers an immune response.
meanings.sent1: The isoantigen caused a reaction in the immune system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors identified the isoantigen in the patient's blood sample.
meanings.sent3: The isoantigen decided to throw a party in the immune system.
meanings.sent4: The isoantigen was like a sneaky intruder to the immune system.
meanings.sent5: The isoantigen was like a red flag waving in front of the immune system.

meanings.definition: An antigen that is present in some individuals of a species but not in others.
meanings.sent1: The isoantigen was only found in a few members of the group.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the isoantigen to understand its distribution.
meanings.sent3: The isoantigen decided to take a vacation from certain individuals.
meanings.sent4: The isoantigen was a unique puzzle piece in the species.
meanings.sent5: The isoantigen stood out like a rare gem among the individuals.
